tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_executing_agency_type AS SELECT f.activity AS amp_activity_id, ot.org_type AS name, b.org_type FROM amp_org_role f, amp_organisation o, amp_role r, amp_org_group b, amp_org_type ot WHERE (((((f.organisation = o.amp_org_id) AND (f.role = r.amp_role_id)) AND ((r.role_code)::text = 'EA'::text)) AND (o.org_grp_id = b.amp_org_grp_id)) AND (b.org_type = ot.amp_org_type_id)) ORDER BY f.activity, o.name;;;
